Edges-Power -- Male Frost Dwarf Heroic Adventurer
Attributes (9 Points):
Agility: d4 Smarts: d10 Spirit: d10 Strength: d8 Vigor: d8
Attribute Notes:
Tough: +1 Vigor Step
Necromantic Weakness: -2 vs. undead effects
Winter Soul: +2 Vigor (resist cold)
Skills (21 Points):
Academics: (sma) d4 Knowledge (Alchemy): (sma) d6 Science: (sma) d4
Armor-Rune: (sma) d4 Notice: (sma) d6 Spellcasting: (sma) d6
Athletics: (agi) d4 Occult: (sma) d10 Stealth: (agi) d6
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4+1 Performance: (spi) d4 Survival: (sma) d4
Heahwisardry: (sma) d10 Persuasion: (spi) d8+1
Languages: Dwarven
Skill Notes:
Arcane Background (Song Magic): +1 Common Knowledge/+1 Persuasion/+1 Knowledge (Folklore)/+1 Knowledge (History)/+1 Knowledge (Riddles)
Arcane Background (Druidism): +1 Druidism in natural environments, -1 in urban environments
Arcane Background (Heahwisardry): -2 arcane skill, +1 per extra round taken (+5 max)
Arcane Background (Hrimwisardry): -2 Persuasion (civilized races)/Hrimwisardry is affected by temperature
Augment Staff (Aura): Staff gives +2 Intimidation or +2 Persuasion
Insular: -2 Persuasion (other races)
Noble: +2 Persuasion (networking with aristocrats)/+2 Common Knowledge (etiquette, heraldry, gossip)
Thin Skinned: -2 vs. Taunt
Size: 0 Deity: Neorthe
Advances: 12 Improvement Points: 27 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 8; Edge: 10; Skill: 9
Features
Edges (10 points): Alchemy: 1; Arcane Background (Druidism): 1; Arcane Background (Elementalism): 1; Arcane Background (Heahwisardry): 1; Arcane Background (Hrimwisardry): 1; Arcane Background (Rune Magic): 1; Arcane Background (Song Magic): 1; Augment Staff (Aura): 1; Augment Staff (Damage): 2; Augment Staff (Deflect): 2; Augment Staff (Spell Store): 2; Combine Spells: 1; Concentration: 1; Elemental Mastery: 3; Elementalism (Eir): 1; Elementalism (Ertha): 1; Elementalism (Fyr): 1; Elementalism (Waeter): 1; Focus: 1; Hellfreeze: 1; Improved Concentration: 1; Improved Focus: 1; Noble: 1; Power Surge: 1; Rune Magic (Armor-Rune): 1; Runic Insight: 3; Spell Finesse (Arcane): 1; Spell Finesse (Armor Penetration): 1; Spell Finesse (Heavy Weapon): 1; Spell Finesse (Range): 1; Spell Finesse (Selective): 1 Hindrances: Necromantic Weakness; Stubborn; Thin Skinned Frost Dwarf Features: Heat Lethargy; Insular; Low Light Vision; Mountain-Born; Slow; Tough; Winter Soul
Feature Notes:
Heat Lethargy: Suffers -1 Trait rolls at temperatures above 52F
Low Light Vision: Ignores penalties for dim and dark illumination
Stubborn: Never admits error
Combat
Parry: 2 (0) Cover: 0 Toughness: 6 (0) Pace/Run: 5/+d4
Armor: None Shield: None Weapons: Unarmed (d8+d0)
Combat Notes:
Slow: -1 Pace/-1 Run Step
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +4
Arcane Background (Hrimwisardry): -4 damage from cold, +4 from heat
Augment Staff (Damage): Staff inflicts d8+d8 damage w/AP 2
Augment Staff (Deflect): Foes suffer -2 ranged attacks
Mountain-Born: Suffers no difficult terrain penalty in hills and mountains
Power Surge: Arcane skill attack inflicts dbl damage
Winter Soul: +2 Armor vs. cold attacks
Arcana
Power Count: 14 Power Points: 60
Powers:
Armor: (2 PP) RTouch Target gains +2 Armor (Raise +4) while maintained (+1 PP/additional target)
Bladebreaker: (2 PP) R10" Target weapon destroyed (Weapon die type neg)
Weapon Immunity: (3 PP) RTouch Target takes half damage (Raise no damage) from specified weapon type while maintained
Common Power Modifiers: +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Druidism): 3 Powers/10 Power Points
Arcane Background (Elementalism): 3 Powers/10 Power Points
Arcane Background (Heahwisardry): 3 Powers/10 Power Points
Arcane Background (Hrimwisardry): 2 Powers/10 Power Points
Arcane Background (Rune Magic): 0 Powers/10 Power Points
Arcane Background (Song Magic): 3 Powers/10 Power Points
Elemental Mastery: Knows spells from 4 Elementalism disciplines, casts at -0
Improved Concentration: Increased Concentration effects
Improved Focus: Increased Focus effects
Alchemy: May create arcane devices for known spells
Augment Staff (Spell Store): Staff can store 2 known spell that may be cast at +2
Combine Spells: May cast two spells simultaneously
Concentration: +4 to resist spell disruption
Focus: May attempt an immediate Spirit roll to recover from Shaken due to spell failure or siphoning
Hellfreeze: Cold spells do normal damage to resistant, half to immune, dbl to vulnerable, and dbl+4 to targets with weakness
Runic Insight: +1 casting on spells of 3 chosen runes
Spell Finesse (Arcane): +1 Wild Die step on chosen spell skill
Spell Finesse (Armor Penetration): Chosen spell has AP 2
Spell Finesse (Heavy Weapon): Chosen spell counts as a heavy weapon
Spell Finesse (Range): Chosen spell has an extended range
Spell Finesse (Selective): May exclude 5 creatures from effects of chosen area spell
